going to`` host'' a Super Bowl bash at a club in Dallas on Friday night. An invitation, shown on the website TMZ.com, touted`` The Michael Vick Experience,'' and read, in part, Four-time Pro Bowl QB Michael Vick would like to personally invite you to the only upscale A-list celebrity extravaganza of the 2011 Super Bowl. This will be the primary& preferred destination for iconic personalities from the NFL, MLB, Hollywood, the music industry and corporate America! Except Michael Vick will not be there. Chrysler debates minivans' future despite popularity WINDSOR, Ontario-- Chrysler is debating the future of its minivans even as it starts making the 2011 Dodge Grand Caravan and Chrysler Town and Country this week. We need to completely rethink the minivan, CEO Sergio Marchionne said Tuesday at the Canadian plant where Chrysler's minivans are made.`` We need to retain all its functionality but make it much more versatile.'' Sergio Marchionne said that could mean new products
